about_the_game:
Ski3 si all about smooth* and unending skiing, on a mountain with hidden dangers and beautiful locations.

The game features:
-Day/Dusk/Night cycle,
-Random weather (from clear sky to heavy blizzard),
-Software raytracing (not hardware, it will work on both AMD and non RTX cards) with very good performance and quality,
-Different obstacles, different handling based on surface and much more.
-Live leaderboards! The score multiplier is based on difficulty level. The higher the difficulty, the higher the score multiplier.

*The game in currently in late beta and as such it is mostly feature complete** and more or less bug free. However, if you find any annoying bug(s) please let me know either on the forum or on discord ( https://discord.gg/n32wEpj9 ) and I will have them fixed very fast.

**What will probably be added in the near future is different map types.

name: Ski3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 @ 3.1 GHz or AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5 GHz or better.
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game can run on a lesser card than the 1060 3GB, but shadows and software raytracing must be turned off in options, which will have a large impact on the graphics.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Experience the frigid and relaxing atmosphere of Ski3 in this 3D rendition of a 90's classic. Ski down the unending alps and collect point by skiing over flags, but beware for you're not alone in these mountains.
